userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material must be obtained from the Digital Library and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State Univeristy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Rutsu Tanimura is an architect in Nagoya City, Japan.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection is comprised of two drawing panels for Asahidai House. The panels demonstrate the design for a house on a sloping site in Aichi-pre.
